website_summaries.verdict: Small cover protects your couch without hindering its functionality.
pros: Cover takes up very little space and frees up the rest of your sofa for you to enjoy
Added bolster provides comfortable head support
Cover could also be used in the car to keep pet hair off the seat
Available in a range of colors
cons: Cover has no grip and may slide off easily, especially on leather furniture

customer_reviews.title: Use it backwards...
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this! I actually put it backwards and stuffed the overlay behind the cushion... the bed stays put and she loves having a "pillow" on all sides now!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet Product I've Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: I used to deal with a whiny, yowling cat all day because I wouldn't let him sit on my lap. Now there's peaceful silence as both annoying bastards sleep soundly cuddled up next to me on the couch. You can't put a price on quiet. It also looks very nice on the couch, not tacky at all like I feared.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Antonuccio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution to letting our chocolate lab on our couch! We were using a blanket but fur would still get on the couch. The quality is very good especially for the price and our dog LOVES it. I will be buying more for the rest of the house!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Werkheiser

customer_reviews.title: Good quality just not for my furbaby
customer_reviews.text: Hard to rate this but, if your furbaby likes to turn in circles and scrunch up blankets before they lay down, don’t bother with this. The quality is good but Sir Chocolate Licks a Lot kept crunching it up into a ball or taking it off the couch in favor of his blanket. Didn’t matter if it was on top or under his blanket lol
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Problem Solver
customer_reviews.text: My French bull dog loves it! It is a little big for him but I added a small pillow to help him nestle in. The edging was pretty flat when it arrived, but I plumped it up as I had read about it. He likes to hang his head on the edge, which seems to help his breathing. This was a cozy addition to our cool leather sofa for him.
customer_reviews.author: R Marshall

customer_reviews.title: not useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dogs and by the time you put it on the couch with the raised cushions on the sides there is no room left for the dog to lay down. I had to put out the recliner in order to have enough flat space left for the dog to lay down.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R.

customer_reviews.title: The bolster is so thick that it pushed my dog to the front of the couch and he looks like he is going to fall off and if he ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up giving this to my mother for her very small dogs. The bolster is so thick that it pushed my dog to the front of the couch and he looks like he is going to fall off and if he stretches his legs out they hang off the couch in mid air. Not very comfortable for him. He ended up just crawling up onto the bolster which defeats the purpose of it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie....CA

customer_reviews.title: Pet Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how this item was packaged. I had not anticipated how large the box would be. It’s very soft. My dog was immediately drawn to it. I purchased this item because my dog would eat treats on the couch and it would leave pieces of the treats stuck to the cushions. I wanted to clean the cushions and keep them clean. This allows the cushions to stay clean and it’s machine washable. My baby Damita Jo is enjoying her new cozy spot to lay!
customer_reviews.author: Sebra A. Davis-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Use it on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Use it on the floor for my older dog to give her a place to get in without lifting legs, but also boundaries on 3 sides she can lean against. I just fold under the "flap" that is supposed to hang down the front of the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Moves around to much!
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful. The fabric is very soft. It looks great. The backing on the part that comes in contact with the couch could really use something to help it grip better. I have a microfiber couch and it just slides all over. It would never work on a leather sofa! Basically it needs something to make it stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie C.

customer_reviews.title: Stitching split after a month.
customer_reviews.text: Update: The stitching split after just over a month of use. And it’s outside of the return window. Very disappointed and hope the Mfg contacts me and offers a replacement. I have a pug who's back legs are paralyzed. As a result, she spends a lot of time just sitting on the couch. This helps to keep the couch clean when she gets fed and drinks. It also supports her really well with the bolster around the edges. It isn't entirely water proof, but it has served its purpose well a couple of times when she has had an accident. It holds up really well in both the washing machine and the dryer. Can't beat the price. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jordan K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful item and my dog loves it. It is a pretty sage green and goes very well in the room where I put it.
customer_reviews.author: Rho Zeta

customer_reviews.title: this saved my couch from my cats!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my cats--- i hate their claws putting holes in my nice leather couch. this thing really saved my couches. not only do the cats love it because its super soft, warm, and comfortable, it's made of such nice material and looks expensive, I can leave it out when company comes over. it traps all their hair so i don't have to worry about sitting on the couch and then standing up covered in kitty hair. and easy to clean!! take out the pillow, dump in the wash, and you're done!!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa m.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my bed. My cats love to sleep against the bolster. Sometimes my dogs get to use it too. One cat loves to sleep under it. When my dogs sleep on it I have it turned so the bolster keeps them from rolling off the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL LET DOWN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this over 5 stars....but the thread stitching that creates the diamond effect on the flap part came apart with no usage. I am not sure if all are like this or i just received a faulty one.but for the price paid to have it come apart that within days really made me sad.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra

customer_reviews.title: No more hairy sofa!
customer_reviews.text: My golden sheds like crazy, and she’s an inside dog. She loves to be close to us as much as possible but we couldn’t have a hairy sofa! We wanted something that looked nice enough to leave on the sofa all the time, was big enough for our large breed dog, didn’t cover the entire sofa, wouldn’t slide down and would keep the sofa clean. This product does the job perfectly! I am very pleased with my purchase and highly recommend it for others who have similar issues with a large dog.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: Most versatile dog spoiling product ever!! Huuman approved!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I live this thing! I'll most likely buy a couple more so I don't have to move it upstairs and downstairs! My Cane Corso Ragnar loves it! Super soft and beautifully made. When I opened the package it was kinda flat because they vacuum pack it, but it fluffed up in a couple hours, and there wasn't any chemical smell like other people reported. My dog loved it immediately! I used it on my bed last night and he slept on it, which will keep my comforter clean from drools, and I use it on the couch, and I'm going to get one for my car too! Great product and multiple uses! Well worth the inexpensive cost!!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Linney

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something our dog likes!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has wanted nothing to do with any dog bed we've bought for him - he always wanted to be on the couch. We bought this and now he lays on it all the time - except for.... when the cats take over! So now, we ordered a 2nd one - now the dog and cats can all be comfy and we don't have to feel guilty for making the dog sleep on the floor, like a dog really should, but hey, we love him so we make him comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Whipple

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, i like it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the new couch I bought 5 months ago..... still havnt gotten that couch due to the Rona`s. because of this it doesn't really fit the current "old" couch, obviously as I bought it for the bigger new one. anyway, because of that fact my giant dog doesn't fit on it and doesn't use it for the moment. However!!!! I can say that this is really comfortable. I have fallen asleep drunk on this bed many-a-nights during quarantine. idk about dogs. but as a human I approve this. im sure my dog will like it too.... if I ever get my new couch
customer_reviews.author: James Keiter

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved this from the minute I put it on the couch. I followed the advice of others and put it on backwards. The dogs feel secure and comfy and the pillow stays put. One thing I really like about this is that I don’t have to clutter my floor with dog beds anymore. I’ve washed it in the washing machine and it didn’t lose its shape at all. The only downfall I can see with this is that it takes up quite a bit of space. Highly recommend if you’ve got a big couch.
customer_reviews.author: Silly Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my dogs off the couch since they shed and one likes to lick, and they absolutely love it. Both dogs (50lb pit mix and 25lb beagle) fit on it with room to spare on a large. It’s very soft, feels very well made, and does not look tacky at all. I’ve been putting it backwards with the long part tucked into the couch cushions to give my dogs as much room as possible, and it stays in place fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Dog's bed on my bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on my bed for my dog. In the hopes that she wouldn't crowd me out during the night. It worked. She stayed in her spot all night. I bought the lighter color because she sheds so much white hair. Abby is a large boxer close to 90 pounds. I would have given it 5 stars if it were a bit larger. Abby doesn't seen to act like it's too small for her. Maybe now I can remove the sheet that's protecting my bedspread.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hastie

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow part that surrounds the one half of the furniture protector was smashed and isn't forming its shape back. The way it was packaged was very jam packed inside its own plastic bag in such a huge box with a medium sized bag of dog food. Didn't understand that. My dog already chewed a hole in it, so make sure if you have chewers that they are supervised using it. He doesn't chew his dog bed in our bedroom so not sure what lead him to doing that to this new one.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Saving our leather couch
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is extending the life of our leather couch. We actually use it differently than pictured in the ads. We turn it around so the pads are toward the front of the couch and stuck the flap under the back cushion. This keeps it from sliding off the couch and gives the dog for of a cuddle bed feeling. Our dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Deick

customer_reviews.title: Used for a ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our oversized ottoman that is 35x35 so it fits the top perfectly. Now just waiting for my ottoman cover so I can add valcro to the bottom to get it to saty in place. The little pillows arent perfectly round so maybe I can stuff more, I'll have to see
customer_reviews.author: E.Lq

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice.....however it came shrink-wrapped (in a box 4x the size) and that process impacted the bolster so it really isn't round - it's more flat. Especially the back portion (width of the bed). I was going to take it out of the case and try to fluff it up, however as I was feeling the back of the bed I noticed that the bolster is not solid, it appears to have been severed into three pieces. We will still use the bed, the color and size are true to advertised, but I don't have much hope for it after I have to remove the cover to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J

customer_reviews.title: As expected 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, quality pet bed for your couch. I haven’t needed to clean yet, but I suspect it will clean easily based on the nice material that it’s made from. When it arrived it looked pretty deformed coming out of the box after a couple hours it took the proper shape like the picture shop. I would recommend this pet couch.
customer_reviews.author: KWVan

customer_reviews.title: Not at all durable with a dog that likes to chew
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t even last 12 hours. The underneath of it ripped super easy and out 6 month old golden retriever-lab mix did this in less than 30 minutes. She has some other stuffed beds that she has chewed on a little without ripping them so easily. Once she had it open, it was short work to empty it out and spread it around 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: I guess mine is the “Roadkill” model...
customer_reviews.text: While otherwise it seems fine, the way this was packaged (Saran-wrapped to within an inch of its life), the bolster on this is smushed beyond recognition. It looks like a victim of roadkill, and looks pretty crappy and cheap. Definitely not happy about the price I paid for such a lackluster outcome, but returns are more hassle than they’re worth. Maple will use it until it’s no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Fabbityfab11

customer_reviews.title: Not that sturdy and came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Not only it’s the middle part not soft and completely flatten up but it feels like rock. As if maybe the filler got dried out or glued. And on top of that it came damaged. I’m ordering again to see if I get lucky but careful when buying this. The second one which it’s beige just came. I’ll check it out and leave or update the review. But so far it is very disappointing. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rise G.

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Too small for a boxer dog. It would be more for a small dog, even in the largest size we got. Instead of returning it we are letting our daughter use it on her couch for her cats and it will be OK. We were hoping the back and sides to be taller. Nothing wrong with the product if you have a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Mc

customer_reviews.title: Our animals loves these
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs and cat love these! We purchased 3 (2 for one couch & 1 for a large ottoman), and they are all regularly occupied. Our couches have stayed so much cleaner since using them. Easy to brush off hair & debris, lays flat, excellent, heavy quality materials & construction. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H.

customer_reviews.title: The dogs like to use them
customer_reviews.text: The green color fit right in to my color scheme in the living room. I got two of them. One for couch and one for the futon. The dogs use them and know exactly what they are for. I figure it will save me lots of washing my couch and futon covers. Before I used them I plumped them up by putting them in the dryer at low heat and ran a couple cycles. The plumped up just fine
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Gainer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Soft, fluffy sides. The look is great! I think my issue is I have leather couches and it needs a stronger rubber underneath to help it stay on the couch better. It’s big enough for a golden retriever to fit in. I’m just unhappy she jumps out of it and it won’t stay put.
customer_reviews.author: KWalker

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it so far
customer_reviews.text: Came in one day. Once I put it on the couch my dog immediately went on it and slept on it. Haven't had a very long but from other reviewers I heard you can wash it in the washer. hope it's easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Itliong Fechter

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have this in the back seat of my car. My dog has no problem with it. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Protector
customer_reviews.text: We have a large Maine Coon Cat that loves to be on our sofa. This protector is a perfect size for her, it’s plushie enough that she likes it, easy to get hair off the protector and the “pillow” surround has become her pillow! Great when company comes, just pull if off and no cat hair. She likes it so much that she only sits/sleeps on her cover. It’s a win win for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rardin

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this cover
customer_reviews.text: I have several cats and they all have cat beds and places they like to sleep. One of my cats, however, didn't like the little bed I got for him. So I tired this cover. He loved it. I put it on my loveseat, and he gets up there every night and goes to bed in his little space.
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves to snuggle and this is a nice size for the bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to snuggle and this is a nice size for the bed, rather than pillows. It was a little smaller in scale than I thought and the stitching is coming apart after just a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: A DIY Would Be Better...
customer_reviews.text: First, the smell. Dogs have a stronger sense of smell. If I couldn’t stand the chemical order, I don’t know how a dog would. The stitch was already coming apart so can’t imagine it lasting through a wash. The arms expanded outward at an angle, not straight, leaving no sitting room on a smaller size couch. Lastly, the back longer part was all flattened and the “cushion” material inside was not soft at all. Honestly, you’re better off just laying down a blanket for the price. If you know how to sew, purchase foam and make your own border. I may just purchase velcro and DIY something myself.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase/quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Clearly my dogs love this and so do I because it keeps dog hair off of my sofa. This is the smaller of my two dogs, he’s almost 50 pounds and I ordere two of the large beds. I took others advice and turned it around and tucked the over hang into the sofa and my dogs liked it much better that way. Before I turned it around my larger dog kept pushing it off the sofa. Now it like a cozy spot for them. I’m very pleased with this purchase. I saw the same type of item for A LOT more than this so it’s also a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We just got this couch and I wanted something to protect it. My fur baby is a 20 lb rat terrier, and the 30x30.5 works perfectly for her size. She loves resting her head on the bloster pillow, and I flip the flap over her for warmth, as she likes to be covered.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnielynn

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.text: Beds are ok. One bolster was crushed "foam" and I could not get it back into shape. Bought two, both had terrible smell which went away after a couple of days but one of my dog's won't go back onto it because of the smell when he first got on it. Don't think I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Ugly and dysfunctional
customer_reviews.text: This is not a nice item. The round cushion area was completely flat on the back side and there were some sort of scratches in the material on the arms. Material is strange as well, but that may have been described in description. Color is ugly in person also. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - torn apart in one day
customer_reviews.text: We have a 30lbs corgi, and the pet cover proved no match for his energy levels. It really shouldn't take a few tugs & chews here & there for a furniture protector DESIGNED for pets to come apart so fast. Regretful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ptdlugosz

customer_reviews.title: Functional and appealing
customer_reviews.text: This Petmaker furniture protector is great. It beautiful and feels wonderful. My cat loves to snuggle with it. The back edges are firm enough to make her feel secure. It looks great on my large ottoman in the family room.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia @fit4apear

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog would typically find a spot where she could cuddle next to me or my husband.....often confining us to a small section of our bed. We set this at the end of the bed for our dog to sleep on. The bolsters kinda give her the feeling of being next to her humans. I am happy to say that she sleeps in "her spot" all night long, leaving plenty of tossing and turning room for us!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Tworings

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Just unpacked this pet bed couch cover. I had a one from another seller and found this one at a lower price. Surprise this one if better than the higher priced one I bought first. This one has much better coverage and the cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gsrapunzel

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Loves
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love their new laying space. It fits perfect on one size of my king size bed and they both lay on it like they now have their own space. I bought a smaller one for my couch and they take turns sitting on it for hours. Love the colors and the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Turee R. Toro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE BOULSTER
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and cats love it. It's wonderful that you can unzip it and throw the cloth portion in the wash. We love taking this on vacation with us and the dogs can use it on the ground or couch/chair
customer_reviews.author: ems

customer_reviews.title: Nice item.
customer_reviews.text: The rolled part was flat when I received it. I let it sit out for about a week and it really never got puffy so we tried to fluff it up and it's not too bad. The box it shipped in was too small for the product and that may be why it was so flat. It doesn't stay on our couch, it falls forward when dog jumps up on it so we leave the foot rest opened up all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Edie Pettit

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl, who is actually 15yrs old, absolutely LOVES hers! I have it on “her spot” of the sofa and she is now up there snoozing all the time. I have tried pet blankets and other things and she refused to use them. She would just move to an uncovered part of the sofa!! But this one did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Debsab

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. My dog ignores them and sits next to them on the couch. Trying to figure out how else to used them. The material is slippery and the bolster is kind of too hard.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in foam inside of the bolster
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my pups and was super excited to use it on our couch. Once I got it out of the ridiculously shrink wrapped packaging, I noticed that the large part of the bolster foam was separated in the middle and smashed down. Not nearly the rolled look it appears to have in the pictures. Needless to say this was a disappointment. Seems like it had been rolled up since 2017 and sitting in the warehouse
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sundberg

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof! My puppy peed on this the first day we had it and the pee soaked right through! Very misleading advertisement for this item, stating it is waterproof and it definitely is not.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Received my sofa protector today. Was new and vacuum packed therefore it was flat, but has fluffed up at least 50% and the note explained it should fluff up 100% within 24-48 hours. My fur babies love it!! And if there happy so am I. The color is as pictured and the material is decent. I won’t give 5 stars because I don’t know how it washes as of yet but other then that we are a happy family....😀😀😀
customer_reviews.author: ginette feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Great bolster for English Bulldog
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old Bulldog loves it. She loves to prop her head on the bolster. I placed it on top of the dog cot so she’s off the ground and she loves it. This brand is good. I’ve had other ones and the inside filling is dilapidated but this one holds well. I’ve washed it 5 times now. Whatever I can do to keep her happy throughout her senior years.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to get this and after opening it the thing is flat and I cant seem to fluff it out. My dog hates it! I think this will go back.
customer_reviews.author: Luluxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Well
customer_reviews.text: I've only seen my dog go on this once so far. The u shaped area is a little stiff and the fabric in the middle is thin and not cushy at all. We'll see if she warms up to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could use a design adjustment
customer_reviews.text: The back part of the Bolster is pretty wide leaving a smaller area for the dog to rest on couch with standard size cushions. My dog actually fell off once when asleep. It is a nice way to protect your furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My Lab NU LOVES this Product! It turned an old ottoman into a couch just for her! My lab runs, jumps & plays on the insert and it is standing up to all of the wear & tear! So Happy that my pooch is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Melanieliz

customer_reviews.title: It’s great.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It would be nice if you could detach the bottom or take off the cover to easily wash it, otherwise it’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: KellyAnne Judd

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! I leave it on the couch and she knows where to sit.. love that.. so now there is not dog hair everywhere on the couch!
customer_reviews.author: barry gregg

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dog so she would stop drooling on my arms of couch, so loves it but still manages to get her drool on my couch...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Venegas

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I've washed it many times and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little while for it to "fluff up" once opened. Works great. I've washed it many times and it is still in one piece. My dog is about 60 lbs and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Soft & comfortable my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very soft fabric! My dog finally got on it after I put her blanket on it. She wouldn't pay on it till I put her blanket on it for her smell I guess. She loves it now! Seems well made & nice price
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Pups love it!
customer_reviews.text: From day one my pups loved this product! Just purchased a second for my other two smaller pups to share!
customer_reviews.author: Sheree C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is below par
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 and both arrived with holes in them. They appear nice and the dogs seem to enjoy them however the trim is large and bulky which takes up a lot of room on the sofa leaving little area for the dogs to lay on. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KENDRA HUNTSMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but didn't make it
customer_reviews.text: This was a good idea, BUT... good luck keeping it on the couch, it slides right off. Such a shame, I was so excited with the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice but doesn't work well if the back of your couch is overly padded
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, matches my couch perfectly but due to larger padded backing on my couch, it doesn't stay put. I also have a leather couch so it's more "slippery" than if use on a fabric couch.
customer_reviews.author: KRod

customer_reviews.title: If you have a chewer dont buy
customer_reviews.text: My dog tore it up within 2 hours of putting it on the couch and the insides are small pieces of foam which made a lot of clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: I have to say these are better than I expected. The bolsters do need to be fluffed up on arrival but were perfect after I did it. Just unzip and pull out the bolster and fluff. Dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Barely fit on couch but found. a different use.
customer_reviews.text: Barely fit on our couch! But I put it on my bed because I always put stuff on my bed. Books, eye glasses, Carmex etc. andthey always fall off. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality throughout
customer_reviews.text: Had other brands of this type of bed before, this one much sturdier and stronger. Will last us a while. Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Hoelscher

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Begger than I thought! Which I love. And as soon as I put it on the couch my dog laid on it. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: We have two small dogs who love sitting on my couch, so far they have enjoyed their new spot. They really like the side bolsters too. Fits well on couch. I use it backwards and tuck into back of couch. Stays perfectly put.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie C

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES laying on this soft couch protector. He knows where his spot is. And it fits well with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and sleep on it instead of their bed. It is soft and well made. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great concept!
customer_reviews.text: Hoped this would work for my dog but unfortunately he ripped apart the part that has stuffing in it within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Had to fold bottom in half, too big, cushions, for my couch. Pet really like and us them.
customer_reviews.author: Ess Pea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, but you get what you pay for !
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea, but cheaply made, Stitching came apart within a day, very slick, dog slips off very easy. Will be returning mine .
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: hair doesnt stick to it and our dog seems to like it: )
customer_reviews.text: As described, hair doesnt stick to it and our dog seems to like it:)
customer_reviews.author: Gerald n Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Just what my pups needed
customer_reviews.text: My pugs love to be on the couch. This works well for them. I will be ordering another for our camper.
customer_reviews.author: sharin

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Resistant
customer_reviews.text: It’s not water resistant. My puppy peed on it and it seeped through the cover into my sofa. Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Don Raul

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material, stuffed with foam shreds and covered in the crappiest faux velvet you’ve ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: fyrechild

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Couch Protectors
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made, soft and comfortable and they have a non slide grip on the back so they stay put. And my dogs love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Huyler

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good multipurpose cover for car, couch, bed. Easy to clean and transport. Dog loves it !
customer_reviews.author: WmVeteran

customer_reviews.title: its okay
customer_reviews.text: It works. Could be better made. Stuffed better and extra string cut off it.
customer_reviews.author: Benniboi

customer_reviews.title: Good cover.
customer_reviews.text: We have not washed it yet so hopefully it stays together. It works for what we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Our frenchie, Doug, loves it and so do we. Literally repels liquid of any kud and easily brushes off clean.
customer_reviews.author: StephieGabs

customer_reviews.title: Good couch protector when you have spoiled pets.
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft and they like the raised edge to use as a pillow. Protects the couch from their nails and shedding so we can pull it off and brush the hair quickly from the couch when company is coming.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Heins

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Could be Bigger
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Measurements given are for outside not inside space. Could have been bigger for laying space.
customer_reviews.author: BuddyG

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog bed just got a new couch and wanted something for the dog to lay on and he really likes this and it protects the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Made space too small
customer_reviews.text: On “my” coach it didn’t leave enough room for my big dog with the pillow bumpers
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, but still worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to help keep the dog hair isolated to one part of the couch. Put it on backwards—we call it the nest. However, the corner stitch ripped after a single wash. I can sew it, but it’s a not super well made to start with. Lots of loose threads all over. I would recommend it though!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs that like to lay their heads on something
customer_reviews.text: Dog was taking up too much of our sectional, so we got him this and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my dog to be able to sit on the couch with me without having a big cover to protect it. Fits perfectly and my dog loves it. I bought the bigger version and he is about 30 lbs and fits great in it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Knight

customer_reviews.title: Too Slippery
customer_reviews.text: It’s too slippery for a big dog. He slides off the couch. Not comfortable for him
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: The bed constantly slips off my sofa. So now ...
customer_reviews.text: The bed constantly slips off my sofa. So now sits on the floor next to my sofa. Purchased to protect my sofa from dog hair and nails, not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice on the couch without making it seem tacky. Good quality. Soft. The stuffing is a little weird, but, hey... I'm not the one sleeping on it, Rambo is, & he hasn't complained, so *shrugs* it works.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Chavez

product_meta.title: PETMAKER Furniture Protector Pet Cover with Bolster Collection
product_meta.description: Color:Gray| Size:30" X 30.5"The PETMAKER Furniture Protector with Bolsters provides comfort to your pet while protecting your furniture. Our 3-sided bolster serves as a pillow for your pet while adding extra protection to the seat back and arms of your furniture.
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR ADDED PROTECTION –This cover was designed to protect your furniture while making your dog, cat or any pet comfortable and at ease while spending time with the family.  The water-resistant bottom layer provides extra defense against damage and stains while the bolster protects furniture seat backs and arms.  We even extended the front drape to add protection to the front of your sofa or loveseat.

COMPLIMENTS ANY HOME DECOR – We offer current patterns in the colors that work best with today’s home décor trends.  Our super soft plush fabric was chosen to accent and coordinate with your furniture for a stylish, yet functional look.

EASY CARE– The furniture covers by PETMAKER offer no-hassle upkeep. You can keep your furniture protector clean by using a light vacuum to remove hair, fur and debris or spot clean with a damp cloth for spots or spills.

PRODUCT DETAILS – Recommended for dogs or pets 60 lbs or less. Dimensions: 30 inches (Length) x 30.5 inches (Width) x 5 inches (Height), Cover; 100% Polyester, Inside Bolster: 100% Polyurethane Shredded Memory Foam, Color: Gray

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – PETMAKER is committed to providing consumers with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of PETMAKER and ONLY Furniture Protector Pet Covers by PETMAKER are GUARANTEED to be genuine
